articles.title: Jasper Lok
articles.contents:
About The Author



Hi there, welcome to my blog! I am currently working as an actuary and in process of becoming a data scientist. I am passionate about transforming business through my actuarial and data science knowledge.
Academic Background
I did my actuarial science undergraduate degree in The Australian National University back in 2009. Ironically I had no clue what actuarial science or statistics is about when I entered into university. It was one of my final year GLM project sparked my interest in statistics and data science.
In 2018, I have enrolled myself into Master of IT in Business (Analytics) in Singapore Management University.



Photo by Franki Chamaki on Unsplash
Throughout my study in SMU, I studied various types of analytics, including customer analytics, social analytics, visual analytics, and operation analytics, to gain a broad understanding of various analytics techniques.
I also specialized in digital transformation strategy in my master course. During the middle of the pandemic, I also did a consulting job for a local SME that is in the oil & gas industry under the guidance of my SMU professors. The task involved preparing a business proposal on how the SME could leverage its current strength to pivot the current business to venture into a new business market. This would help the SME to ensure its revised business model is more resilient to external market forces.
Work Experience
I have been working in both life insurance and general insurance as an actuary since my first job. Since that, I have worked on the following:  - Product pricing on various life, general, group insurance products  - Experience analysis  - Participating fund management  - Distribution compensation  - Analytics related project  - New business model 
In conclusion, my background & experience can be summarized as following:



Bachelor of Actuarial StudiesThe Australian National University
Dec 2019


Actuarial Pricing Senior ExecutivePrudential Assurance Company Singapore
Mar 2012 - Oct 2014


Actuarial Pricing Senior ExecutiveGreat Eastern Life Assurance Co Ltd
Oct 2014 - Jun 2014


Actuarial Life Pricing Assistant ManagerNTUC Income Insurance Co-operative Limited
Jul 2015 - Jul 2018


Actuarial Life Reporting Assistant ManagerNTUC Income Insurance Co-operative Limited
Jul 2018 - May 2020


Actuarial Data Analytics ManagerNTUC Income Insurance Co-operative Limited
May 2020 - Present


Master of IT in BusinessSingapore Management University
Aug 2021



Do visit my LinkedIn page or contact me if you are interested to find out more on my work experience!
Contact
Feel free to contact me on email or LinkedIn.

articles.title: When Actuarial Science Collides with Data Science
